Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Irving Park
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
